com.canabang.genietext.core.view
Class GraphicalViewWindowListener

java.lang.Object
  com.canabang.genietext.core.view.GraphicalViewWindowListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
WindowListener, EventListener
public class GraphicalViewWindowListener
extends Object
implements WindowListener

Listens to a View class for window events. If the view is about to be closed, then this object needs to shut down the service so that abrupt termination does not occur on the remote-service.

Version:
1.00 2009-05-31 Initial submission.
Author:
rhaq

Field Summary
private  SmsServiceProvider service
          The service we need to terminate in case the main view is being terminated.
 
Constructor Summary
GraphicalViewWindowListener()
          Creates an instance of this listener class so that it can start listening to a view class.
